recipes.label: The Wrong Kind of Attention
recipes.startdescription: The city is rife with journalists and detectives and other meddlers. How long will they leave me in peace?
recipes.description: I'm safe for now. The meddlers' attention must be elsewhere. A relief.

recipes.label: Searching for Clues...
recipes.startdescription: An adversary is asking questions about my activities...

recipes.label: An Incendiary Trap!
recipes.startdescription: The tripwire is tense with anticipation, and the release of that tension will be particularly destructive -

recipes.label: An Incendiary Trap!
recipes.startdescription: The tripwire is tense with anticipation, and the release of that tension will be particularly destructive -

recipes.label: An Incendiary Trap!
recipes.startdescription: The tripwire is tense with anticipation, and the release of that tension will be particularly destructive -

recipes.label: An Incendiary Trap!
recipes.description: Screams are lost in fire. Our adversary goes stumbling from the rubble, burned and bloodied.

recipes.label: An Incendiary Trap!
recipes.description: Our trap has failed its purpose. The Hunter, uncovering our device, has gone into hiding for fear of further danger.

recipes.label: The Devil in the Details
recipes.startdescription: An Observant Hunter is disentangling the consequential from the inconsequential...

recipes.label: Money Talks?
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter has found proof of my crimes, but they have made it clear that one could arrange for them to un-find that proof. [Provide Spintriae to bribe this Hunter into discarding Reputation cards. You may need to do this multiple times to succeed.]

recipes.label: Money Talks
recipes.startdescription: This might be enough to buy my innocence. Or it might not.

recipes.label: Not Quite Enough
recipes.startdescription: My adversary smiles. 'Surely your freedom is worth a little more than that.'

recipes.label: A Successful Bribe
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter is satisfied - for now. A handshake seals the arrangement. Tonight, a file will be misplaced at the Central Office.

recipes.label: Justice by the Sword
recipes.startdescription: A Belligerent Hunter is orchestrating an attack...

recipes.label: Justice by the Sword
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter has given their associates a target, or is pursuing one themselves. There will be blood.

recipes.label: Justice by the Sword
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter has given their associates a target, or is pursuing one themselves. There will be blood.
recipes.description: Nothing. This Hunter could find no target for their mob justice.

recipes.label: An Attack on the Street!
recipes.startdescription: One of my followers has come under attack -
recipes.description: As luck would have it, my follower was able to hold their own against this assault. My adversary will retreat for now, but if I am not careful with our reputation, I can expect another attack in short order.

recipes.label: An Attack on the Street!
recipes.description: The Hunter's assault is swift, and merciless. My follower will need medical attention.

recipes.label: An Attack on the Street!
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter is attempting to harm me directly -
recipes.description: The Hunter's assault is swift, and merciless. I will need medical attention.

recipes.label: A Final Sentencing
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter is making an attempt on my life! This will wound me - fatally so, if my body is not ready for the coming assault. [Supply Health immediately, or die.]

recipes.label: A Silver Tongue
recipes.startdescription: A Persuasive Hunter is attempting to sway a follower's loyalty...

recipes.label: A Silver Tongue
recipes.startdescription: If I do not act, these words will take root in my follower's heart like a poison. [This will inflict Resentment upon your follower if allowed to proceed. You can provide Passion to defend against this, but you may need to do so multiple times.]

recipes.label: Rhetoric and Manipulation?
recipes.startdescription: I will remind them of their loyalties, of their sacrifices and their pacts. Perhaps that will be enough to hold them.

recipes.label: Rhetoric and Manipulation
recipes.startdescription: I have secured my follower against this Hunter's persuasions. They will remain loyal for the time being, and our adversary will withdraw to reassess their strategies.

recipes.label: The Serpent in the Garden
recipes.startdescription: This Hunter is a cunning and articulate creature. Their subtle counsels have struck a chord with my follower - perhaps I ought to trust them with less, now.

recipes.label: The Perils of Renown
recipes.startdescription: My Mystique has attracted this hunter's attention. They can prove nothing yet, but they'll keep looking for longer, now.

recipes.label: Considering the Evidence...
recipes.startdescription: If a Hunter has found Notoriety, they will try to use it to create or upgrade Evidence. If they're Meticulous, they'll always succeed. If they're Erratic, they're more likely to fail... but they can occasionally create Evidence even without Notoriety.
recipes.description: I am safe, for now. My adversary has not enough evidence to bring a case against me, and they've found no new clues.

recipes.label: Converting Clues to Evidence
recipes.startdescription: Rumour squats on rooftops and flutters in gutters. This hunter is making progress in their investigation.
recipes.description: I am certain that my adversary has lodged a copy of their notes elsewhere - with their solicitor, with their superior, or even with a contact in the press. This is troubling.

recipes.label: Menace of the Press
recipes.startdescription: A Publicist is sensationalising evidence of my crimes...
